summary: Now you can craft Crossbows and bolts at any forge or anvil in Skyrim and also buy a Crossbow and Bolts from blacksmiths throughout Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Now you can craft any Crossbow and Bolt at any forge or anvil in Skyrim. When you unlock the ability to craft the Dwarven Crossbow, Dwarven Bolts, and Exploding Bolts through the Dawnguard questline you able to craft them at any forge. The Steel Crossbow and Steel Bolts can be crafted at any forge even before you start the Dawnguard questline. You may also buy a Crossbow and Steel Bolts from Blacksmiths across Skyrim. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/999/?]here[/url]. Also check out my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83773/?]Stormcloak Craftable Armor[/url] mod.

Requirements
Skyrim
Dawnguard

To install just download then extract folder and drag plugin, and bsa into your data folder.
author: LegoManIAm94
